Henry H. Wheeler, Jr.
Brain Imaging Center

Helen Wills
Neuroscience Institute

This directory contains various stable release versions of lyxport.

It will download as a gzipped tar file named lyxport-XXX.tgz, where XXX is the version number.

Unzip/untar with:

tar -xzf lyxport-XXX.tgz

It will create a directory named lyxport-XXX where you will find detailed documentation and installation instructions.

Enjoy, and please report bugs/problems/comments to:

Fernando Perez, <Fernando.Perez@colorado.edu>
